EmailTemplate.name: 2019_ADS-B_Expedited_Retrofit_LandingPage.2019_06_ADS-B_Affordable_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Will Expedite Your ADS-B Retrofit at an Affordable Price
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Keeping You Flying Affordably The ADS-B Out Upgrade Program for Jets with Primus II Radios Dear Operator,
Honeywell is announcing its expedited upgrade program for Primus® II Radio System-equipped aircraft through a Honeywell Authorized Avionics Dealer. The Honeywell solution provides an affordable upgrade to the OEM-certified configuration and maintains the system integrity as originally certified.
These upgrades guarantee integration with the rest of the avionics, unlike competing "add-on" solutions that may create subsequent issues, loss of features, and troubleshooting / support confusion.
Guarantee compliance at an affordable price, find out more now!
FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_ADS-B.html]]>
